ssot__AgentWork__dlm.name: Agent Work
ssot__AgentWork__dlm.description: The Agent Work DMO represents a work assignment that's been routed to an agent.

ssot__AcceptDate__c.description: The date the agent work was accepted.

ssot__ActiveTimeSeconds__c.description: The time an agent is active on work in seconds.
ssot__ActiveTimeSeconds__c.title: Active Time

ssot__AftConvWorkTimeActual__c.description: The actual time an agent works after a conversation.

ssot__AftConvWorkExtensionCount__c.description: The count an agent works extended time.
ssot__AftConvWorkExtensionCount__c.title: After Conversation Work Extension Count

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the agent work DMO.
ssot__Id__c.title: Agent Work Id

ssot__AgentWorkRoutingType__c.description: The routing type for agent work.
ssot__AgentWorkRoutingType__c.title: Agent Work Routing Type

ssot__AgentWorkStatus__c.description: The status of the agent work.
ssot__AgentWorkStatus__c.title: Agent Work Status

ssot__BotId___c.description: A reference ID to the agent work bot.

ssot__CloseDateTime__c.description: The date the agent work was closed.
ssot__CloseDateTime__c.title: Close Date

ssot__DateSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DateSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__Description__c.description: The description of the agent work.
ssot__Description__c.title: Description

ssot__HandleTimeSeconds__c.description: The time to handle agent work in seconds.
ssot__HandleTimeSeconds__c.title: Handle Time

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the agent service presence.
ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.title: Internal Organization

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the agent work.
ssot__Name__c.title: Name

ssot__PreferredUserId__c.description: A reference ID to the preferred user for the agent work.
ssot__PreferredUserId__c.title: Preferred User

ssot__RelatedToId__c.description: A reference ID to the related item for the agent work.
ssot__RelatedToId__c.title: Related To

ssot__RequestDateTime__c.description: The date the agent work was requested.
ssot__RequestDateTime__c.title: Request DateTime

ssot__SpeedToAnswerSeconds__c.description: The time to answer the agent work in seconds.
ssot__SpeedToAnswerSeconds__c.title: Speed To Answer

ssot__UserId__c.description: A reference Id to the agent work user.
ssot__UserId__c.title: User

ssot__UserGroupId__c.description: A reference Id to the agent work user group.
ssot__UserGroupId__c.title: User Group
